resources.string:
Welcome to Treasure Hunter.

 How To Play:
 	 To play the game press PLAY GAME on the main menu. Then select a tile to search for treasure, If you find a treasure an image of a gem will appear, otherwise a number will appear that shows you the amount of hidden treasure in the same row and column as the tile you just clicked. Find all the treasure to win!


Info:
